pr_title: Change compaction retention time granularity to hour

timeline.message: compataction retention time granularity to hour

timeline.bodyText: minor: Might want to change to "Message retention hours" for the exception message.
timeline.author: SophieGuo410
jsjtzyy

timeline.bodyText: @justinlin-linkedin if logSegmentForecastOffsetMs becomes a few hours and bucketSpanInMs, bucketCount stay unchanged, will it be a problem? logSegmentForecastEndTimeMsForDeleted  > scan timestamp
timeline.author: jsjtzyy

replies.bodyText: @jsjtzyy @zzmao  I don't think so, buckets are designed to serve the incoming requests, it shouldn't be affected by the retention duration. One we get a smooth transition is to not enable bucket reporting in delivery cluster.
replies.author: justinlin-linkedin

replies.bodyText: Thanks and noted. I will disable bucket reporting in EI testing.
replies.author: zzmao

replies.bodyText: Sure, we can temporarily disable bucket and revisit this before turning it on.
replies.author: jsjtzyy

timeline.bodyText: One minor suggestion:  maybe we can use 7 * 24 as default value which lines up with we are using for main cluster, and change this for delivery cluster only.
